alert.note: Alert for South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 3:11PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sioux and northeastern Goshen Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 211 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lingle, or 8 miles northwest of Torrington, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Torrington, Lingle and Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska...and southeastern Wyoming.
